headline: Blackstone (NYSE:BX) Shares Jump 11% Over The Last Week
summary: Blackstone (NYSE:BX) announced a few significant updates, including a strategic alliance with Wellington Management and Vanguard to enhance investment opportunities, and a buyback tranche update in which the company repurchased 200,000 shares. These developments coincided with a 10.51% increase in Blackstone's share price over the past week. Against a backdrop of a 7% rise in the broader market during the same period, Blackstone's price movement may reflect confidence from investors...

headline: The Market May Be About To Get Turned Upside Down
summary: With the rise of AI, traditional index funds like SPY and QQQ could face challenges. Read why infrastructure and farmland could become the biggest winners.
